Keywords: Avengers , Codex , Monster , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Eugene "Flash" Thompson
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
CLEANSING POWERS: Support as FREE.
SYMBIOTE: Plasticity, Shape Change.
WAIT! I HAVEN'T CURED YOU YET: Outwit. Once per turn, when Agent Anti-Venom uses it, after resolutions he may use Outwit an additional time but only to target a character with the Spider-Man Family or Monster keyword.
Figure Errata
Changed "Wait! I Haven't Cured You Yet"

July 13, 2021
nlegore
ERRATA: WAIT! I HAVEN'T CURED YOU YET: Outwit. Once per turn when Agent Anti-Venom uses it, after resolutions he may repeat the FREE action to use Outwit, but only to target a character with the Spider-Man Family or Monster keyword.
October 7, 2020
mc268
He’s pretty darn good. Support as free and double outwit. Not to mention mobile with charge, improved movement and plasticity. He has a decent defence value, especially up close. My one worry is that between his utility, short dial and lack of protection from range, he’ll have a big target on his back. Still though, he can play a few different roles on your team and really make an impact. Good stats, indom and the mid dial can still surprise your opponents too.
August 31, 2020
Lance24
He can heal twice in the secreto identity dial isnt he?
August 26, 2020
GL_Alex
Really cool piece. I love the free Support. Starts off a healing brawler and then moves to tie up support. He's definitely a must have for Spider-Family teams.
